caption.center: ROSEMARIE PORTER v. RUSSELL W. ARLIA.

opinion.posture: Petition of defendant for writ of certiorari denied. SeeGiarrusso v. Corrigan, 108 R.I. 471, 276 A.2d 750 (1971).
opinion.attorneys:
Raymond R. Coia, for plaintiff.
Keenan, Rice, Dolan, Reardon Kiernan, Leonard A. Kiernan,Jr., Smith Smith Incorporated, Z. Hershel Smith, for defendant.
